def give_last(arr):
    last_value = arr[0]
    n = 0
    while n < len(arr):
        last_value = arr[n]
        n += 1
    return last_value

def give_last(arr):
    last_value = arr[0]
    n = -1
    while n < len(arr) - 1:
        n += 1
        last_value = arr[n]
    return last_value
